game.name: PAYDAY 2: The Official Soundtrack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PAYDAY 2: The Official Soundtrack is the first DLC pack and the first soundtrack for PAYDAY 2. It includes a collection of 22 MP3 tracks made by OVERKILL's celebrated composer Simon Viklund. As PAYDAY 2 grows, the official soundtrack grows with it, and new tracks are added for free.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PAYDAY 2: The Official Soundtrack is the first DLC pack and the first soundtrack for PAYDAY 2. It includes a collection of 22 MP3 tracks made by OVERKILL's celebrated composer Simon Viklund. As PAYDAY 2 grows, the official soundtrack grows with it, and new tracks are added for free.
